name: diplomatically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 in a way that involves diplomats or the management of the relationships between countries: The government has demonstrated its commitment to end the crisis diplomatically. They are making an effort to isolate the island diplomatically.
C2 approving in a way that does not cause offence: "I liked all of the competition entries," she said diplomatically. He had to choose his words diplomatically. See
diplomatic
More examplesFewer examplesThe two sides agreed to participate in the talks to resolve the matter diplomatically.Leoni diplomatically avoided any suggestion of conflict.This is one of those situations you have to handle very diplomatically.
